name: LD51 Tower Blob Defence Game
description:
LD51 Jam game made in 48 hours.
Place towers to kill enemies.

You can upgrade existing towers two times.

If a single enemy reaches the end it's game over!
Game is made with Love2d
-- Bugfixes --
- Forgot to add the cost to the normal towers.
- Clamped dt to prevent monsters from leaving their path.
